Well done @Aussie7s brains trust. #Sydney7s https://t.co/vRoyEOOXRJ
Mick Adams gets @Aussie7s sixth ... And the bench are on their feet #Aussie7s #Sydney7s https://t.co/K7Rnc1vS04
Myers has come into his own as captain. He gets his 2nd and @Aussie7s fifth Try. Making a statement! #Aussie7s
WHAT a first half from the @aussie7s Men! FOUR tries to one v Scotland. Tim Anstee has a treble and a great captain's try to Myers #Sydney7s
THAT'S THREE for Anstee!!! #Sydney7s #Aussie7s
Tim Anstee has two early tries for @Aussie7s
Men's Pool C: @Aussie7s v Scotland up next. #Sydney7s
MASSIVE upset at #Sydney7s World and Olympic champs @Aussie7s have gone down to Canada in semi. NOT the hometown performance they wanted!
@GeezyGreen with the first Try - and don't the crowd love it! #AUSvCAN #GoAussies #Sydney7s
Brilliant reception from the crowd - standing ovation - as the @Aussie7s Women run out for semi v Canada. #Sydney7s
So Kiwis won't go back-to-back after title win in Dubai. USA with an unexpected but solid win to go into the #Sydney7s Cup Final.
Portia Woodman has been sin-binned with 2'00 left and NZ down by 12 pts. #NZLvUSA #Sydney7s
Rugby lover Hutchison is a leader in the making. #Aussie7s #Sydney7s https://t.co/uZbuW9bOuc
We could have a boil over in the Women's semi. USA leads NZ at h/t 12-0. Rare for Black Ferns to be scoreless at this pt. #Sydney7s
HUGE win for @WelshRugbyUnion over @fijirugby in Pool B matchup 28-15. That's 2/2 for Wales with Samoa to come! #Sydney7s
Morgan Williams gets a treble early in the second half. This lead is growing - Not something the Fiji fans at #Sydney7s expected. #FIJvWAL
AND another to @WelshRugbyUnion and Morgan Williams! Fiji wondering what's going on here. #Sydney7s
Fiji get one on the board followed by another from Wales - Owen Jenkins goes in under the bar off a long run from the centre. #Sydney7s
@WelshRugbyUnion score within the first 20 seconds! Great run up the wing by Morgan Williams. #Sydney7s
Next match should be a beauty... FIJI v WALES in their 2nd Pool B game. #Sydney7s
